revised_title: Equivalence between Centre Manifold and Multiple Scales Reductions in Fluid Motion Stability
tldr: The author demonstrates the equivalence between the centre manifold and multiple scales reductions in the weakly nonlinear stability analysis for fluid motions. They use the plane Poiseuille flow as a model and derive the Landau equation to establish the complete equivalence between the two methods, emphasizing the importance of defining the disturbance amplitude correctly.
